greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1)=0; for n>1, a(n) = k if n is a non-prime-power, A007916(k), say; or 0 if n is a prime power.
link: Rémy Sigrist, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: FoldList[Boole[#2 != #1] #2 &, #] &@ Accumulate@ Array[Boole[And[# > 1, CoprimeQ @@ FactorInteger[#][[All, -1]]]] &, 81] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Dec 18 2016 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 10 2016
